wikipedia_page.main: James Buchan (19 April 1881 – 1950) was a Scottish professional football wing half, best remembered for his seven years in the Football League with Manchester City. He also played league football in England for Woolwich Arsenal and in Scotland for St Johnstone, Hibernian, Motherwell, Kilmarnock and Forfar Athletic. After his retirement from football, Buchan managed St Johnstone.
